questions.title: 我很感激你对我的所有帮助。
questions.answer: I'm very grateful for all the help you have given me.

questions.title: 那个卖书的男人很感激他的邻居给他这份工作。
questions.answer: The man who sells books in the shop is grateful for his neighbor's givinghim this job.

questions.title: 我非常感激我所有的粉丝们来我的第一场演唱会。
questions.answer: I'm very grateful for all my fans coming to my first vocal concert.

questions.title: 那个穿着破烂衣服的乞丐对你的同情表示感激。
questions.answer: The beggar who wears tattered clothes is grateful for your sympathy.

questions.title: 我非常感激你长久以来的帮助。
questions.answer: I'm very grateful for your age-old assist.

answer.en: I'm grateful for your order of 100 tons of coal.
I hope that we can cooperate happily.

title: ——很感激你送我礼物。
——我还不知道你是否喜欢它呢。

answer.en: I'm grateful for you sending me a present.
Idon't even know if your will like it.
I'm grateful for your taking me a round-the-world tour.
I'm also very happy with you by my side.
